title: The wealthy grasiers joyes compleated. Or, The shepherd's beautiful daughter obtained. His love was pure, and did endure, and will for evermore; her beauty bright is his delight, and her he doth adore. Tune of, Ladies of London, &c. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltspur-street, without Newgate.,
